results.title: Topical metformin 30% gel in the treatment of acne vulgaris in women, a split face, placebo-controlled study.
results.text_hl: Although, lesions count increased 1 month after stopping treatment, @DISEASE_Comedones_Familial_Dyskeratotic @DISEASE_MESH:C562838 @@@comedones@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Acrodermatitis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000169 @@@papules@@@ numbers were still significantly less on the @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ side compared to placebo.

citations.NLM: El-Komy MHM, Abdo NMK, Shamma RN, Bedair NI. Topical metformin 30% gel in the treatment of acne vulgaris in women, a split face, placebo-controlled study. Exp Dermatol. 2023 Jun 26;():. PMID: 37357907
